knowledge.title: Local Knowledge Base
knowledge.description: A knowledge base stored locally in the browser.
knowledge.name: Name
knowledge.webCrawlerTip: The web crawler obtains the page content of the specified URL through server and returns the data in Markdown format.
knowledge.addResourceMessage: {{title}} has been added to the resource.

editor.placeholder: Please enter text, or enter "/ " to use commands

setting.title: Setting
setting.description: All settings are saved in the user's browser.
setting.providerTip: AI service provider. For AI aggregation services such as One Api and New Api, please select `Compatible OpenAI`.
setting.modeTip: In local mode, all requests are sent directly by the browser. In proxy mode, all requests are forwarded through the server.
setting.apiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter the model API key
setting.apiUrlPlaceholder: Please enter the API base URL
setting.accessPasswordPlaceholder: Please enter the server access password
setting.accessPasswordTip: Server-side API authentication prevents API from being misused by external applications.
setting.thinkingModelTip: The core model used in deep research, it is recommended to use the thinking model.
setting.networkingModelTip: The model used for secondary tasks, high output models are recommended.
setting.webSearchTip: Web search can obtain the latest data and help reduce model `hallucinations`. It is recommended to enable it.
setting.searchProviderTip: Search service providers. Some models have built-in network search capabilities, while most models need to rely on third-party search engines to achieve networking capabilities.
setting.parallelSearchTip: Parallel search helps speed up the data collection process, but too high a rate may trigger the model's request per minute limit.
setting.searchResultsTip: The maximum number of web searches. Some search engines do not support this parameter.
setting.languageTip: The system will automatically select the interface language based on the user's browser language.
setting.debugTip: System debugging can help users capture request exceptions and locate unknown errors. Normally, it does not need to be enabled.
setting.PWATip: A Progressive Web App is an application built using web platform technologies that provides a user experience close to that of native applications.
setting.resetAllSettings: Reset settings and clear the cache
setting.resetSettingWarning: This operation will clear all data and initialize the project.
setting.referencesTip: Enabling references will add reference links to search results and final reports via prompt. This may not work well for small models.
setting.citationImageTip: Enabling reference images will attempt to add content-related images to the final report through a prompt.
setting.textOutputModeTip: Text output effect of AI. Characters, output text like a typewriter. Words, output by word, the output is most efficient. Lines, the output effect is most stable.
setting.useLocalResourceTip: When enabled, only local resources will be used for research and web crawling. No external network requests will be made.
